name: [proposal] no unnecessary type changing wrapper
[no-type-alias] Unhandled in union types are not allowed for keyof or typeof
[unbound-method] this: void syntax should be highlighted in document and suggested in message
[no-unsafe-call] and [no-unsafe-member-access] improve reporting message when noImplicitThis is not enabled
[@typescript-eslint/no-unnecessary-type-assertion] Fixer leaves extra character behind
[no-unnecessary-type-assertion] too restrictive with intended temporary narrowing
[naming-convention] Support class type for variable selector
[no-type-alias] Readonly<[A, B]> should be allowed same as readonly [A, B] by allowTupleTypes
[object-curly-spacing] Rule does not apply to MappedType
[type-annotation-spacing] Space between ? and :
Remove TSParenthesizedType
[strict-boolean-expressions] False positive with union types having only one falsey value
[consistent-type-import] flags non-type-only imported type as a value import when used in a decorator
[array-bracket-spacing] doesn't work on types
[dot-notation] add support for TS4.2's noPropertyAccessFromIndexSignature option
[@typescript-eslint/no-unnecessary-condition] Proposal to allow unnecessary optional chaining
[no-duplicate-imports] False positive in d.ts file with multiple module declarations
Alignment with ESTree class-features
[@typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-return] thinks value is any even when typed correctly
[member-ordering] feature request: differentiate methods and callback signatures
Rule proposal: Ensure special verbs match the type (e.g. hasName is boolean or boolean function)
[RFC] AST structure of TSImportType to be more align with rest of AST
[no-unused-vars] false positive when class property has the same name as import
Add a rule to warn against passing a non-void returning callback in a position accepting a void returning callback.
Symlinks cause parserOptions.project errors
